favourite.article: We sang this song at our table meeting yesterday. A sister asked me to send it to her. I enjoyed the lines, "His righteous fury, not on us, but on the Lamb did fall. Our surety and substitute, has pardon for us found". Thank You dear Lord for this wonderful song, words and music.
Halluejah!!! We stand on legal ground, our surety and substitute!! Christ our legal ground!!!
